languages.text: "И скорблю об этом. Увы, мой враг, кем бы он ни был, оказался слишком стремителен, а мысли мои пребывали в смятении. Воздух в том мире пахнет чем-то дурным. Не скверной... преступлением".
"And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."
languages.original_text: "И скорблю об этом. Увы, мой враг, кем бы он ни был, оказался слишком стремителен, а мысли мои пребывали в смятении. Воздух в том мире пахнет чем-то дурным. Не скверной... преступлением".

traits.locale_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: “这让我很难过。遗憾的是，虽然不知道我的敌人是谁，但他的动作极其敏捷，让我的头脑混乱不已。那个世界的空气散发着恶臭的味道，不是腐化的恶臭……而是罪恶的恶臭。”
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: “这让我很难过。遗憾的是，虽然不知道我的敌人是谁，但他的动作极其敏捷，让我的头脑混乱不已。那个世界的空气散发着恶臭的味道，不是腐化的恶臭……而是罪恶的恶臭。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「遺憾だよ。哀しいことに俺の敵は、どいつもこいつも速すぎるって分かったし、俺の頭は混乱してた。あの星の空気は嫌な臭いがぷんぷんする。腐臭じゃない…罪の臭いだ」
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: 「遺憾だよ。哀しいことに俺の敵は、どいつもこいつも速すぎるって分かったし、俺の頭は混乱してた。あの星の空気は嫌な臭いがぷんぷんする。腐臭じゃない…罪の臭いだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Y me duele. Lamentablemente, mi enemigo, fuera quien fuese, fue demasiado rápido y yo estaba descentrado. El aire de ese mundo apesta a algo infame. No a corrupción... sino a crimen».
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: «Y me duele. Lamentablemente, mi enemigo, fuera quien fuese, fue demasiado rápido y yo estaba descentrado. El aire de ese mundo apesta a algo infame. No a corrupción... sino a crimen».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Et croyez bien que cela me navre. Hélas, mon ennemi s'est montré trop rapide et une tempête faisait rage dans mes pensées. Quelque chose de fétide empuantit l'air de ce monde. Il ne s'agit pas de l'odeur de la corruption... mais de celle du crime. »
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: « Et croyez bien que cela me navre. Hélas, mon ennemi s'est montré trop rapide et une tempête faisait rage dans mes pensées. Quelque chose de fétide empuantit l'air de ce monde. Il ne s'agit pas de l'odeur de la corruption... mais de celle du crime. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Und das betrübt mich. Leider war mein Feind, wer immer es war, zu schnell, und meine Gedanken waren durcheinander. In der Luft dieser Welt liegt ein fauliger Geruch. Nicht nach Verderbnis ... sondern nach Verbrechen."
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: "Und das betrübt mich. Leider war mein Feind, wer immer es war, zu schnell, und meine Gedanken waren durcheinander. In der Luft dieser Welt liegt ein fauliger Geruch. Nicht nach Verderbnis ... sondern nach Verbrechen."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Evet, buna üzülüyorum. Ne yazık ki düşmanım her kimdiyse fazla hızlıydı, zihnimdeki tilkiler de yerinde durmadı. O dünyanın havasında kötü bir koku var. Yozlaşma kokusu değil, suç kokusu."
languages.original_text: "And it grieves me. Alas, my enemy, whoever they were, proved too swift, and my thoughts were in turmoil. The air of that world reeks of something foul. Not of corruption... but crime."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, buna üzülüyorum. Ne yazık ki düşmanım her kimdiyse fazla hızlıydı ve zihnimdeki tilkiler yerinde durmadı. O dünyanın havasında kötü bir koku var. Yozlaşma kokusu değil, suç kokusu."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
